Quiz: Navigating within a File in VSCode

Questions.question: Accept First Quick Fix
Questions.note: Open the quick fix menu and accept the first suggestion

Questions.question: Find All References
Questions.note: Find all references to the current symbol in the workspace

Questions.question: Rename Symbol
Questions.note: Rename a symbol and update all references to it in the file

Questions.question: Go to Definition
Questions.note: Go to the definition of the symbol under the cursor

Questions.question: Peek Definition
Questions.note: Peek the definition of the symbol under the cursor

Questions.question: Go to Type Definition
Questions.note: Go to the type definition of the symbol under the cursor

Questions.question: Peek Type Definition
Questions.note: Peek the type definition of the symbol under the cursor

Questions.question: Go to Implementation
Questions.note: Go to the implementation of the symbol under the cursor

Questions.question: Peek Implementation
Questions.note: Peek the implementation of the symbol under the cursor

Questions.question: Go to Line
Questions.note: Go to a specific line in the current file

Questions.question: Go to File
Questions.note: Go to a specific file in the workspace

Questions.question: Go to Symbol
Questions.note: Go to a specific symbol in the current file

Questions.question: Go to Next Problem
Questions.note: Go to the next problem in the current file

Questions.question: Go to Previous Problem
Questions.note: Go to the previous problem in the current file

Questions.question: Go to Next Error
Questions.note: Go to the next error in the current file

Questions.question: Go to Previous Error
Questions.note: Go to the previous error in the current file

Questions.question: Go to Next Warning
Questions.note: Go to the next warning in the current file

Questions.question: Toggle Terminal
Questions.note: Open or close the terminal

Questions.question: Toggle Sidebar
Questions.note: Show or hide the sidebar

Questions.question: Go to File...
Questions.note: Quickly navigate to a file

Questions.question: Go to Line...
Questions.note: Go to a specific line in the current file

Questions.question: Find in File
Questions.note: Find a specific text in the current file

Questions.question: Find in All Files
Questions.note: Find a specific text in all files

Questions.question: Replace in File
Questions.note: Replace a specific text in the current file

Questions.question: Replace in All Files
Questions.note: Replace a specific text in all files

Questions.question: Save File
Questions.note: Save the current file

Questions.question: Save All Files
Questions.note: Save all open files

Questions.question: Toggle Full Screen
Questions.note: Switch between full screen and normal mode

Questions.question: Toggle Zen Mode
Questions.note: Switch to a distraction free coding environment

Questions.question: Split Editor
Questions.note: Split the editor into multiple panes

Questions.question: Switch Editor
Questions.note: Switch between open editors

Questions.question: Close Editor
Questions.note: Close the current editor

Questions.question: Reopen Closed Editor
Questions.note: Reopen the last closed editor

Questions.question: Show All Commands
Questions.note: Show all available commands

Questions.question: Show Extensions
Questions.note: Show installed extensions

Questions.question: Show Explorer
Questions.note: Show the file explorer

Questions.question: Show Source Control
Questions.note: Show the source control panel

Questions.question: Toggle Integrated Terminal
Questions.note: Show or hide the integrated terminal

Questions.question: New Terminal
Questions.note: Create a new terminal instance

Questions.question: Close Terminal
Questions.note: Close the current terminal instance

Questions.question: Switch Terminal
Questions.note: Switch between terminal instances

Questions.question: Copy Line Up/Down
Questions.note: Copy the current line up or down

Questions.question: Move Line Up/Down
Questions.note: Move the current line up or down

Questions.question: Add Line Comment
Questions.note: Add a line comment to the current line

Questions.question: Add Block Comment
Questions.note: Add a block comment around the current selection

Questions.question: Remove Comment
Questions.note: Remove comment from the current line or selection

Questions.question: Expand Selection
Questions.note: Expand the current selection to the next logical unit

Questions.question: Shrink Selection
Questions.note: Shrink the current selection to the previous logical unit

Questions.question: Jump to Matching Bracket
Questions.note: Jump between matching brackets

Questions.question: Select All Occurrences
Questions.note: Select all occurrences of the current selection

Questions.question: Select All Occurrences of Find Match
Questions.note: Select all occurrences of the current selection

Questions.question: Select Next Occurrence
Questions.note: Select the next occurrence of the current selection

Questions.question: Select Next Occurrence of Find Match
Questions.note: Select the next occurrence of the current selection

Questions.question: Select All
Questions.note: Select the entire file

Questions.question: Select Line
Questions.note: Select the current line

Questions.question: Select Word
Questions.note: Select the current word

Questions.question: Select to Line Start
Questions.note: Select to the start of the current line

Questions.question: Select to Line End
Questions.note: Select to the end of the current line

Questions.question: Select to File Start
Questions.note: Select to the start of the file

Questions.question: Select to File End
Questions.note: Select to the end of the file

Questions.question: Select to Bracket
Questions.note: Select to the matching bracket

Questions.question: Select to Next Bracket
Questions.note: Select to the next bracket

Questions.question: Select to Previous Bracket
Questions.note: Select to the previous bracket
